officeHours: Monday - Friday, 8:30 AM - 5:00 PM, and by appointment
description:
At Puff & Cockerill, L.L.C., we are proud to serve our clients in Haddonfield, New Jersey. We represent clients in mediation matters, local courts and federal courts. To meet the growing demands of our clients, we hire a large team of attorneys, each of whom bring years of experience to the table.

Who We Represent

Are you the right client for us? Take a look at the people we represent:

  • Individuals: Some of the cases we take on that affect individuals include asset protection, personal injury, trusts, medical malpractice and workers' compensation.
  • Consumers: Consumer law is not a common practice area at our firm, but we fight as hard for product liability and other consumer cases as we do for any other.
  • Families: Common cases when representing families include adoption, child custody and divorce. We also assist with probate administration and nursing home neglect cases.
  • Landlords and tenants: We frequently represent either party of real estate disputes in cases related to construction, commercial leases, land use and property development.
  • Businesses: From creating your business to handling contract disputes, our team of lawyers helps our clients protect their business interests.

Why Choose Puff & Cockerill, L.L.C.?

Experience is one of the top deciding factors in whether you win or lose your case. We bring 40 years of experience across multiple practice areas to your case.
